problem_text_cn: 如图,铁道口拦栏杆的短臂长1.25米,长臂长16.5米,当短臂的端点下降0.85米时,长臂的端点升高了拦栏杆的宽度忽略不计)()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the length of the short arm of the railing at the railway crossing is N_0 and the length of the long arm is N_1. When the end of the short arm drops by N_2, the end of the long arm raises the width of the railing.
raw_answer:
解:∵∠DCO=∠ABO=90°,∠AOB=∠COD,∴△CDO∽△BAO,∴\frac{CD}{AB}=\frac{CO}{BO},∴CO=1.25米,BO=16.5米,DC=0.85米,∴\frac{0.85}{AB}=\frac{1.25}{16.5},解得:AB=11.22,∴长臂端点升高11.22米．
故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了相似三角形的应用,关键是掌握相似三角形对应边成比例．
